attributes.action: Allow parents take children out of school out of half term up to 10days a year
attributes.additional_details:
Current law discriminates against:
-human right to family time
-families who are not wealthy
-neurodivergent children or children with disabilities
-families who have relatives in different countries
-families where working adult has fixed rota
It is felt that current law is more orientated to be new tax. We do undrestand education is important but so is family time.
attributes.background: Allow parents take kids out of school out of half term/summer holidays up to 10 days each year. Excluding times of child exams

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Allow parents to take their children out of school for up to 10 days fine free.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700047
